name: check-linkaja
title: Check Name LinkAja
description: Memeriksa dan mengambil nama pemilik akun LinkAja berdasarkan nomor telepon.
curl:
curl -X POST https://bovalone.me/api/check-linkaja \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_API_KEY" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{"phone_number":"081234567890"}'
